verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w If|strong="H1931"\w* someone sins \w and|strong="H1121"\w* acts unfaithfully \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* deceiving \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbor \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w regard|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deposit \w or|strong="H5704"\w* security entrusted \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* stolen, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w if|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* extorts \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbor

\w or|strong="H5930"\w* finds lost property \w and|strong="H3548"\w* lies \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* swears falsely, \w or|strong="H5930"\w* \w if|strong="H7760"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* commits \w any|strong="H7760"\w* such sin \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* might \w commit|strong="H7760"\w*—

once \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* sinned \w and|strong="H3318"\w* becomes guilty, \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w must|strong="H2351"\w* return what \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* stolen or \w taken|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* extortion, or \w the|strong="H3318"\w* deposit \w entrusted|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*, or \w the|strong="H3318"\w* lost property \w he|strong="H3318"\w* found,

\w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3808"\w* \w else|strong="H3808"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H4196"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H3548"\w* sworn falsely. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H1197"\w* restitution \w in|strong="H5921"\w* full, add \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fifth \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w value|strong="H6186"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* pay \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* owner \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* acknowledges \w his|strong="H5921"\w* guilt.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* bring \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* priest \w his|strong="H5921"\w* guilt offering \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: \w an|strong="H5921"\w* unblemished ram \w of|strong="H4196"\w* proper value \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flock.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* priest \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make atonement \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* forgiven \w for|strong="H6440"\w* anything \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* done \w to|strong="H3068"\w* incur guilt.”
\w Then|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Moses,

“Command Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* law \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*: \w The|strong="H4480"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* hearth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w*, until morning, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fire \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* kept burning \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar.

\w And|strong="H2403"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* linen robe \w and|strong="H2403"\w* linen undergarments, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* remove \w from|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* altar \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ashes \w of|strong="H2403"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w has|strong="H5414"\w* consumed \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* beside \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H1121"\w* off \w his|strong="H3605"\w* garments, \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* clothes, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* carry \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ashes outside \w the|strong="H3605"\w* camp \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially clean \w place|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* altar \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* kept burning; \w it|strong="H1696"\w* must \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* extinguished. \w Every|strong="H3068"\w* morning \w the|strong="H3068"\w* priest \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* add wood \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fire, arrange \w the|strong="H3068"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* burn \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fat portions \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* kept burning \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* altar \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*; \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* extinguished.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* law \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* grain \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: Aaron’s sons \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* front \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* altar.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* remove \w a|strong="H3068"\w* handful \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w fine|strong="H6213"\w* flour \w and|strong="H1121"\w* olive oil, \w together|strong="H8478"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* frankincense \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w grain|strong="H6999"\w* \w offering|strong="H6999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* memorial \w portion|strong="H2706"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* altar \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing aroma \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Aaron \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w are|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remainder. \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* eaten \w without|strong="H3808"\w* leaven \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w place|strong="H1961"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* courtyard \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Meeting.

\w It|strong="H1696"\w* must \w not|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* baked \w with|strong="H3068"\w* leaven; \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* assigned \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* portion \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* food \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w*. \w It|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H3068"\w* holy, \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Any|strong="H6440"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H8451"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w may|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* permanent \w portion|strong="H6944"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* food \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* generations \w to|strong="H1696"\w* come. Anything \w that|strong="H1931"\w* touches \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* become \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.”
\w Then|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H4725"\w* Moses,

“\w This|strong="H6942"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* offering \w that|strong="H3605"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w must|strong="H1818"\w* present \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* anointed: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tenth \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H6918"\w* fine flour \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* regular \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* offering, half \w of|strong="H6918"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning \w and|strong="H1818"\w* half \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening.

\w It|strong="H7665"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* prepared \w with|strong="H3627"\w* oil \w on|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* griddle; \w you|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w bring|strong="H7665"\w* \w it|strong="H7665"\w* well-kneaded \w and|strong="H4325"\w* present \w it|strong="H7665"\w* \w as|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grain offering \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pleasing aroma \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Aaron’s sons \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H2145"\w* anointed \w to|strong="H3605"\w* take \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* prepare \w it|strong="H1931"\w*. \w As|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* permanent \w portion|strong="H6944"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* must \w be|strong="H2145"\w* burned \w completely|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* \w for|strong="H3722"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* priest \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w*; \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.”
And the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said to Moses,

“Tell Aaron and his sons that this is the law of the sin offering: In the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered, the sin offering shall be slaughtered before the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; it is most holy.
The priest who offers it shall eat it; it must be eaten in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy place, in the courtyard of the Tent of Meeting.
Anything that touches its flesh will become holy, and if any of the blood is spattered on \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment, you must wash it in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* holy place.
The clay pot in which the sin offering is boiled must be broken; if it is boiled in \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bronze pot, the pot must be scoured and rinsed with water.
Any male among the priests may eat it; it is most holy.
But no sin offering may be eaten if its blood has been brought into the Tent of Meeting to make atonement in the Holy Place; it must be burned.
